title: Explosion at India firecracker factory leaves more than 20 dead – video
text: A fireworks factory blast in northern India has killed at least 22 people and left a trail of destruction in the Punjab town of Batala. Many of the injured were severely hurt and surrounding buildings and cars destroyed. It was not clear if the factory was a legal facility, or one of the many illegal fireworks factories dotted across the country, which often have lax safety standards. India marks Diwali, the festival of lights, next month when revellers across the country set off countless fireworks
